parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Retrieve By
parameter.tooltip: How to retrieve the submission. Id or Query.

parameter.label: Datastore Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form to query

parameter.label: Index
parameter.tooltip: The index to use for the search/retrieval

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: A query that will retrieve a single submission

parameter.label: Datastore Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being retrieved.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Space slug of which the user you are trying to updates belongs to (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Current User Name
parameter.tooltip: User name of user you wish to update.

parameter.label: Display Name
parameter.tooltip: The displayName for the user.

parameter.label: Email
parameter.tooltip: The email for this user profile.

parameter.label: Preferred Locale
parameter.tooltip: The preferred language for the user, in the format languageabbreviation[_COUNTRYABBREVIATION]. Examples: en, fr, es, en_GB, es_MX

parameter.label: Enabled
parameter.tooltip: Select if this user profile will be enabled (boolean)

parameter.label: Password
parameter.tooltip: Reset password for a user.

parameter.label: Space Admin
parameter.tooltip: Select if you desire for this user to have space admin privledges.(boolean)

parameter.label: New Username
parameter.tooltip: Change the username for this user.

parameter.label: Append or Replace attributes?
parameter.tooltip: Append or replace the existing attribute values with the attributes provided.

parameter.label: Attributes
parameter.tooltip: Change the attributes for this user. JSON formatted string: [{"name": "Attribute Name","values": ["Attribute Value","Attribute Value",...]},{"name": "Attribute Name2","values": ["Attribute Value",...]},...]

parameter.label: Profile Attributes
parameter.tooltip: Change the profile attributes for this user. JSON formatted string: [{"name": "Profile Attribute Name","values": ["Profile Attribute Value","Profile Attribute Value",...]},{"name": "Profile Attribute Name2","values": ["Profile Attribute Value",...]},...]

parameter.label: Append or Replace memberships?
parameter.tooltip: Append or replace the existing memberships with the memberships provided.

parameter.label: Memberships
parameter.tooltip: Change the memberships (e.g. teams) for this user. JSON formatted string: [{"team": {"name": "Facilities"}}, {"team": {"name": "Engineers"}},...]
